ì¥ì¡°ë¦¼ (Sogogi Gyeran Jangjorim - Braised Beef and Egg, #7)
* 300g beef (for soup or stew, e.g., brisket)
* 4 cups cold water
* 5 boiled eggs
* 10 whole garlic cloves
* 1 cup soy sauce
* 1/4 cup sugar
* 1/4 cup mirin
* 2 red chilies (optional, for garnish/slight heat)

ë©¸ì¹˜ë³¶ìŒ ì•„ëª¬ë“œ (Myeolchi Bokkeum - Stir-fried Anchovies, #77)
The provided recipe does not include almonds, but here is the base list. You would simply add almonds to this preparation.
* 1 cup dried anchovies (small to medium size)
* 1 Tbsp soy sauce
* 1 Tbsp honey or corn syrup
* 1 tsp sesame oil
* Sesame seeds (optional)
* Cooking oil

ë©¸ì¹˜ë³¶ìŒ ë§¤ì›€ (Gochujang Myeolchi Bokkeum - Spicy Stir-fried Anchovies, #78)
* 1 cup dried anchovies (small to medium size), dry-roasted
* 1 Tbsp gochujang (Korean chili paste)
* 1 Tbsp honey or corn syrup
* 1 tsp soy sauce
* 1 tsp sesame oil
* Sesame seeds (optional)
* Cooking oil

ì–´ë¬µë³¶ìŒ (Eomuk Bokkeum - Stir-fried Fish Cakes, #80)
* 1 cup Korean fish cakes (eomuk), sliced into strips
* 1/2 cup onion, thinly sliced
* 1/2 cup green bell pepper, thinly sliced
* 1 Tbsp soy sauce
* 1 tsp sugar
* 1 tsp minced garlic
* 1 tsp sesame oil
* Sesame seeds (optional)
* Cooking oil

ì§„ë¯¸ì±„ (Ojingeo Chae Bokkeum - Stir-fried Shredded Dried Squid, #81)
* 1 cup shredded dried squid
* 1 Tbsp gochujang (Korean chili paste)
* 1 Tbsp honey or corn syrup
* 1 Tbsp mayonnaise
* 1 tsp sesame oil
* Sesame seeds (optional)
* Cooking oil
